name: In Space (itch) (Debuggd)
description:
You are controlling (WASD or Arrow Keys) the little spaceship and trying not to collide with the obstacles. Sometimes it seems you can't go further, but the world is broken, so there are obstacles which are not real and you can see with your special light (shift). The light has a cooldown!

(This is btw. my first finished game. So, there could be bugs ;D)
